profile.aboutMe: I’m Mohammad Habib, a Front-End Developer with over two years of experience using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, Tailwind CSS with a good understanding of UI/UX.
profile.profilText: I’m Mohammad Habib, a 23-year-old Front-End Developer experienced with modern web technologies and building high-quality responsive websites.
profile.skillsText: I have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I use React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind to build responsive and interactive websites.
